Class SchedulerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.gridengine.SchedulerConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridEngineSchedulerConnection

    public abstract class SchedulerConnection
extends Object
    Connection to a remote scheduler, implemented by calling command line commands over a ssh connection.

    Niels Drost
